overview: Haunted Daycares! Spooky Houses! Poltergeists, the Paranormal and one irritating group of squirrels! There is nothing this crew of intrepid ghost investigators can't figure out. Join them as they attempt to document their investigations into the other world, while trying to survive the night... and each other!
tagline: When Fearing Fear Is The Only Thing To Fear
title: Adventures of the Haunted Hunted
